name: bricktracker
description: BrickTracker is a web app for managing and cataloging LEGO and similar construction sets. It allows users to organize collections, record set ownership, and track missing pieces using a simple UI.
features: LEGO Cataloging: Manage and organize your LEGO collection. Complete inventory.
Set Tracking: Record ownership and track missing pieces. Know what you have.
Collection Management: Organize sets by theme, year, or custom categories. Smart organization.
Simple Interface: Easy-to-use web UI for managing collections. Intuitive design.
Piece Tracking: Monitor individual pieces and parts. Detailed inventory.
Self-Hosted: Keep your collection data private. Complete control.
Search Functionality: Find sets and pieces quickly. Instant discovery.
Hobby Management: Perfect for LEGO enthusiasts and collectors. Built for fans.
